ack.p: We thank professor Gui-jie DING and Ji-ming LIU for surpports in work. We thank professor Li-fei YU to guide in the expriment process. We are grateful to Chang-bang WU to conduct this experiment. We are grateful to the Institute of Plant and Natural Resources, Beijing Academy of Agriculture and Forestry Science of China for providing Glomus etunicatum (BGGAM0046) for use in our experiments.
